item.title: MLU-Explain
item.description: Machine Learning University (MLU) is an education initiative from Amazon designed to teach machine learning theory and practical application. As part of that goal, MLU-Explain exists to teach important machine learning concepts through visual essays in a fun, informative, and accessible manner.
